meanings.definition: Of or relating to a macruran crustacean.
meanings.sent1: The macruran creature had long, slender legs.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the macruran species in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The macruran crab decided to throw a party for all its underwater friends.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as a macruran dancer.
meanings.sent5: The macruran characteristics of the shrimp made it easy to identify.

meanings.sent1: I saw a macruran scuttling along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The macruran was a key part of the marine ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The macruran waved its claws in a friendly greeting.
meanings.sent4: The fisherman's net was filled with macrurans of all sizes.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch macrurans in aquariums.
